summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to the recommendations where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 17 priority open recommendations for the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) as of April 2020. For example, strengthening...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Housing and Urban Development
